message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I know it's valuable and I'm sure you'll find it worth the price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I can come down a bit to $110, but that's my best offer.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I understand your position and would like to propose an offer of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
